page.title: 07Retirement
page.content: 73% of the adult population in the Mudeford area is retired.(626 males,955 females).A limited enquiry showed the following results:- None of the people questioned had lived in Mudeford all their lives and the majority had moved here after 1970.Most chose Mudeford because it is a beautiful,quiet place with friendly people.The sea and forest proved the other main attractions.Most chose a bungalow,50% own a car,50% rely on the bus service which they find adequate. Children carrying out the survey found the variety of leisure activities pur sued by retired people interesting. Gardening,music,walking,painting,stamp collecting,geneaology.The only improvement suggested was the provision of more public seats and shelters between Mudeford and Christchurch.
